mapper.select:
SELECT u.user_id, u.mobile, u.portrait_url, u.user_type, u.`name`, u.company_id, u.superior_id, u2.`name` AS superior_name, c.company_name FROM t_user u LEFT JOIN company c ON u.company_id = c.company_id LEFT JOIN t_user u2 ON u.superior_id=u2.user_id
u.user_id = #{userId} AND u.`status` =1
